content:
79. Consider the following statements :
1. In India, the Biodiversity Management Committees are key to the realization of the objectives of the Nagoya Protocol.
2. The Biodiversity Management Committees have important functions in determining access and benefit sharing, including the power to levy collection fees on the access of biological resources within its jurisdiction.
Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
(a) 1 only
(b) 2 only
(c) Both 1 and 2
(d) Neither 1 nor 2

{"topics":["Environment","Biodiversity"],"sub-topics":["Biodiversity Management Committees","Nagoya Protocol"],"core_topic":"Role of Biodiversity Management Committees in India","user_intent":"Evaluate the correctness of statements regarding the role of Biodiversity Management Committees in India and their relation to the Nagoya Protocol.","is_ambiguous":false,"query_category":"question","target":"curriculum","is_in_upsc_scope":true,"is_topic_switched":true,"next_agent":"Thalia","vector_database_retrieval_queries":["Biodiversity Management Committees in India","Nagoya Protocol objectives","access and benefit sharing in biodiversity","collection fees by Biodiversity Management Committees"]}

98. In the recent years Chad, Guinea, Mali
and Sudan caught the international
attention for which one of the following
reasons common to all of them?
(a) Discovery of rich deposits of rare
earth elements
(b) Establishment of Chinese military
bases
(c) Southward expansion of Sahara
Desert
(d) Successful coups

{"topics":["International Relations","Current Affairs"],"sub-topics":["Political Instability","African Geopolitics"],"core_topic":"Recent political events in Chad, Guinea, Mali, and Sudan","user_intent":"Identify the common reason for international attention on Chad, Guinea, Mali, and Sudan.","is_ambiguous":false,"query_category":"question","target":"curriculum","is_in_upsc_scope":true,"is_topic_switched":true,"next_agent":"Thalia","vector_database_retrieval_queries":["Chad Guinea Mali Sudan recent events","coups in Chad Guinea Mali Sudan","political instability in African countries","international attention on African countries"]}

76. Consider the following statements:
Statement-I :
According to the United Nations'
World Water Development Report,
2022', India extracts more than
a quarter of the world's groundwater
withdrawal each year.
Statement-II:
India needs to extract more than
a quarter of the world's groundwater
each year to satisfy the drinking water
and sanitation needs of almost 18%
of world's population living in its
territory.
Which one of the following is correct in
respect of the above statements?
(a) Both Statement-I and Statement-II
are correct and Statement-II is the
correct explanation for Statement-I
(b) Both Statement-I and Statement-II
are correct and Statement-II is
not the correct explanation for
Statement-I
(c) Statement-I is correct but
Statement-II is incorrect
(d) Statement-I is incorrect but
Statement-II is correct

{"topics":["Geography","Environment"],"sub-topics":["Water Resources","Groundwater Extraction"],"core_topic":"India's groundwater extraction and its implications","user_intent":"Evaluate the correctness of statements regarding India's groundwater extraction and its relation to population needs.","is_ambiguous":false,"query_category":"question","target":"curriculum","is_in_upsc_scope":true,"is_topic_switched":true,"next_agent":"Thalia","vector_database_retrieval_queries":["India groundwater extraction statistics","World Water Development Report 2022","India's water needs and population","groundwater usage in India"]}

22. Consider the following statements :
Statement-I:
In the post-pandemic recent past, many Central Banks worldwide had carried out interest rate hikes.
Statement-II:
Central Banks generally assume that they have the ability to counteract the rising consumer prices via monetary policy means.
Which one of the following is correct in respect of the above statements?
(a) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are correct and Statement-II is the correct explanation for Statement-I
(b) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are correct and Statement-II is not the correct explanation for Statement-I
(c) Statement-I is correct but Statement-II is incorrect
(d) Statement-I is incorrect but Statement-II is correct

{"topics":["Economics","Monetary Policy"],"sub-topics":["Interest Rate Hikes","Central Banks"],"core_topic":"Central Banks' interest rate hikes post-pandemic","user_intent":"Evaluate the correctness of statements regarding Central Banks' interest rate hikes and their ability to counteract rising consumer prices.","is_ambiguous":false,"query_category":"question","target":"curriculum","is_in_upsc_scope":true,"is_topic_switched":true,"next_agent":"Thalia","vector_database_retrieval_queries":["Central Banks interest rate hikes post-pandemic","monetary policy and consumer prices","Central Banks' strategies against inflation","post-pandemic economic policies"]}

11. Consider the following statements :
Statement-I:
India, despite having uranium deposits, depends on coal for most of its electricity production.
Statement-II:
Uranium, enriched to the extent of at least 60%, is required for the production of electricity.
Which one of the following is correct in respect of the above statements?
(a) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are correct and Statement-II is the correct explanation for Statement-I
(b) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are correct and Statement-II is not the correct explanation for Statement-I
(c) Statement-I is correct but Statement-II is incorrect
(d) Statement-I is incorrect but Statement-II is correct

{"topics":["Energy","Nuclear Energy"],"sub-topics":["Electricity Production in India","Uranium and Nuclear Power"],"core_topic":"India's energy production and uranium usage","user_intent":"Evaluate the correctness of statements regarding India's reliance on coal and uranium enrichment for electricity production.","is_ambiguous":false,"query_category":"question","target":"curriculum","is_in_upsc_scope":true,"is_topic_switched":true,"next_agent":"Thalia","vector_database_retrieval_queries":["India electricity production coal vs uranium","uranium enrichment for electricity","India's uranium deposits","nuclear energy in India"]}

93. Consider the following pairs:
Regions often Reason for being
mentioned in news in news
1. North Kivu and Ituri: War between
Armenia and
Azerbaijan
2. Nagorno-Karabakh : Insurgency in
Mozambique
3. Kherson and : Dispute between
Zaporizhzhia Israel and Lebanon
How many of the above pairs are
correctly matched?
(a) Only one
(b) Only two
(c) All three
(d) None
